message.body: I feel like a fool. I guess I am just surprised that you wouldn't place more importance on our time together.
We said we would tentatively hang out tuesday and fri, i didnt realize that it was the same friday. We can still hang out two nights here like we planned we just have to adjust
Ok. You didn't even think to invite me.
Because we got the tickets in july...
Im sorry i wasnt thinking. Please don't take offense, you know i'm terrible at calendars. I can hang any other night next week and monday, friday or saturday day
It's ok; I'm just extra emotional right now with the move. Thanks for reaching out.
What is your address? Tiki will send you the refund.
(He might send you the whole thing, and you can just give me my portion whenever)
Do you want the bow that needs rehairing that was in your room?
No, its not worth fixing. Did i leave my electric bug repeller in the kitchn?
Yeah, I grabbed it for you.
Thanks, im gonna need it :-/ ive got roaches and millipedes as house guests
